author: bridge-bot
content:
<parithoshj> We're only doing ~100 keys per host as the aim was to test p2p and not necessarily beacon chain size. If the preference is to test large state as well then we can do 3k keys/host or similar.

If we don't test it here, it'll still be tested on holesky before landing on mainnet anyway.

author: barnabasbusa
content: 3k keys would result in a chain 2x goerli. I would possibly hold off similar sized test for maybe a mainnet shadowfork.

author: parithosh
content: we'll start sync tomorrow and once its done we'll trigger the shadowfork ðŸ˜„
